divs: Sighting DetailsI was on duty with a group of junior high students at our school in Bolivar. I looked up and caught the cigar shape. It was very high and much larger than an airliner. If I put my index finger and thumb up it would have been 1.5 inches between my fingers. Several students watched it for two minutes and then it stopped, blinked on and off several times and then vanished. I have seen many B2 Bombers and jets fly over. This was too fast and large for that. No wings. Very white and long. Like nothing I have ever seen before.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Bolivar
There were no other sightings in Bolivar on or around April 8th 2010
